description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useNotes' that manages notes stored in localStorage. It provides CRUD operations (create, update, delete) and keeps component state synchronized with localStorage.

methods.name: useNotes(key = "notes-app-notes")
methods.description: Custom React hook for managing notes stored in localStorage. It handles initialization, synchronization, and CRUD operations for notes data.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with a unique ID and timestamp, adds it to the notes state, and returns the new note object.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates a note identified by ID with provided changes and updates the timestamp.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note identified by ID from the notes state.
